                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Dita watched television from $5{:}35 \ \text{pm}$ until $7{:}10 \ \text{pm}$. How long did she spend watching television?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $ \begin{aligned} \text{Time spent on TV} &= 7{:}10 \ \text{pm} - 5{:}35 \ \text{pm} \\ &= 1 \ \text{hours} \ 35 \ \text{minutes} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $1 \ \text{hours} \ 35 \ \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Dita watches the television for $2 \text{ hours } 45 \text{ minutes}$ each weekend. How much time does she spend watching television over three weekends?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $ \begin{aligned} \text{Time spent over three weekends} &= 2 \ \text{hours} \ 45 \ \text{minutes} + 2 \ \text{hours} \ 45 \ \text{minutes} + 2 \ \text{hours} \ 45 \ \text{minutes} \\ &= 8 \ \text{hours} \ 25 \ \text{minutes} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $8 \ \text{hours} \ 25 \ \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                The second hand of a clock points to the number $2$. After one minute and twenty seconds what number will it be pointing to?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $ \begin{aligned} \text{After one minute and twenty seconds} &= 2 + 1 \ \text{minute} \ 20 \ \text{seconds} \\ &= 2 + 20 \ \text{seconds} \\ &= 6 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $6$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Neil is allowed to watch three hours of TV each day in the holidays. He watches cartoons from $6{:}20 \ \text{pm}$ to $7{:}10 \ \text{pm}$ and a sports programme from $7{:}25 \ \text{pm}$ to $9{:}00 \ \text{pm}$.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        For how much longer could he have watched TV without breaking his rule?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Let's calculate the total time spent by Neil watching TV.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text{Cartoons duration} &= 7{:}10 \ \text{pm} - 6{:}20 \ \text{pm} \\ &= 50 \ \text{minutes} \\ \text{Sports duration} &= 9{:}00 \ \text{pm} - 7{:}25 \ \text{pm} \\ &= 1 \ \text{hour} \ 35 \ \text{minutes} \\ \text{Total time spent} &= 50 \ \text{minutes} + 1 \ \text{hour} \ 35 \ \text{minutes} \\ &= 2 \ \text{hr} \ 25 \ \text{minutes} \\ \text{Time left} &= 3 \ \text{hr} - 2 \ \text{hr} \ 25 \ \text{minutes} \\ &= 35 \ \text{minutes} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Neil could have watched TV for $35 \ \text{minutes}$ more without breaking his rule.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $35 \ \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-manchester-grammar-school--11-plus--maths--2012--arithmetic-1.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        rag_up_oldpr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        My digital watch is set to show time according to the $24$ hour clock. It is currently showing $21{:}10$. How long will it be until it next shows a time with the digits $2, 1, 1$ and $0$ but in any order?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $21{:}10$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Following digits are needed $0, 1, 1$ and $2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $2100$ hours no other combination is impossible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $2200$ hours no combination is possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $2300$ hours no combination is possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $0000$ hours no combination is possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $0100$ hours it's possible as it already has $0$ and $1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Next time all the four digits $(0, 1, 1, 1)$ shows together is when it is

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $01{:}12$ hours

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Let's find how long it will take from $21{:}10$ to $01{:}12$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $01{:}12 - 21{:}10 =4\ \text{hrs} \ 2 \ \text{min}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $21{:}10$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Following digits are needed $0, 1, 1$ and $2$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $2100$ hours no other combination is impossible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $2200$ hours no combination is possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $2300$ hours no combination is possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $0000$ hours no combination is possible

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        With $0100$ hours it's possible as it already has $0$ and $1$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Next time all the four digits $(0, 1, 1, 1)$ shows together is when it is

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $01{:}12$ hours

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Let's find how long it will take from $21{:}10$ to $01{:}12$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $01{:}12 - 21{:}10 =4\ \text{hrs} \ 2 \ \text{min}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $4\ \text{hrs} \ 2 \ \text{min}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Alison watches two quiz programmes on TV. The first is on from $6.35 \ \text{pm}$ until $7.15 \ \text{pm}$, the second lasts for half an hour. Later on, she watches a film from $9.30 \ \text{pm}$ until $11.25 \ \text{pm}$. In hours and minutes, how long has she spent watching TV?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text{First quiz duration} &= 7.15 \ \text{pm} - 6.35 \ \text{pm} \\ &= 40 \ \text{min} \\ \text{Second quiz duration} &= 30 \ \text{min} \\ \text{Film duration} &= 11.25 \ \text{pm} - 9.30 \ \text{pm} \\ &= 1 \ \text{hour} \ 55 \ \text{min} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Let's calculate the total time spent watching TV.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $ \begin{aligned} \text{Total time} &= 40 \ \text{min} + 30 \ \text{min} + 1 \ \text{hour} \ 55 \ \text{min} \\ &= 3 \ \text{hour} \ 5 \ \text{minutes} \\ \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $3 \ \text{hour} \ 5 \ \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        the-manchester-grammar-school--11-plus--maths--2014--arithmetic-a.toml

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      A cookbook gives the time to cook a turkey as “$25\, minutes$ per kilogram plus an additional $30\, minutes$”

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      %empty%

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • How long will it take to cook at $4\,kg$ turkey?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          This can be solved using ratios.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ 1 \text{kg} : 25 \text{minutes} \\ 4 \text{kg} : 25 \times 4 \text{minutes} \\ 4 \text{kg} : 100 \text{minutes} \\ $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          It takes an additional of $30 \text{minutes}$ = $100 \text{minutes} + 30 \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ = 130 \text{minutes}$ $ = 2 \text{hours} 10 \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ = 2 \text{hours} 10 \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • If I wish to have the $4\,kg$ turkey ready to eat at $1.15 \ \text{pm}$ what is the latest time I should start cooking it?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Time taken to cook $4 \ \text{kg}$ turkey = $ = 2 \text{hours} 10 \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Time that cooking should be started = $1.15 \ \text{pm} - 2 \text{hours} 10 \text{minutes}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $= 11.05 \ \text{am}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $= 11.05 \ \text{am}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • I calculate on another occasion that the turkey I have bought will take $3\, hours$ to cook. How heavy is this turkey?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Let the weight of the turkey = $a \ \text{kg}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $3 \ \text{hours} = 3 \times 60 = 180 \ \text{minutes}$ As per the question,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $ \begin{aligned} (a \times 25) + 30 &= 180 \\ 25a &= 180 - 30 \\ 25a &= 150 \\ a &= \dfrac {150} {25} \\ a &= \dfrac{25 \times 6} {25} \\ a &= \dfrac{\cancel {25} \times 6} {\cancel {25}} \\ a &= 6 \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Let the weight of the turkey = $6 \ \text{kg}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $6 \ \text{kg}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • $236\, cm$ in meters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $ \begin{aligned} &= 236 \ \text{cm} \\ &= \dfrac {236} {100} \ \text{m} \\ &= 2.36 \ \text{m} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    $2.36 \ \text{m}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • $0.07$ as a fraction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \begin{aligned} &= 0.07 \\ &= \dfrac {0.07 \times 100} {100} \\ &= \dfrac {7} {100} \end{aligned}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      $\dfrac {7} {100}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • $5:39 \ \text{pm}$ using the $24\, hour$ clock

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $5:39 \ \text{pm} + 12 \ \text{hours} = 17:39 \ \text{pm}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        $17:39 \ \text{pm}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • $2.45\, kg$ in grams

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $ \begin{aligned} &= 2.45 \ kg \ &= 2.45 \times 1000 \ \text{g} \ &= 2450 \ \text{g} \end{aligned} $

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          $2450 \ \text{g}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • $867$ to the nearest $10$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $860$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            $860$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • the number of sides on a pentagon

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of sides on a pentagon = $5$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              $5$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • $10\%$ as a fraction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                \begin{aligned} &= 10 \% &= \dfrac {10} {100}\\ &= \dfrac {1 \cancel 0} {10 \cancel 0} \\ &= \dfrac {1} {10} \end{aligned}

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                $\dfrac {1} {10}$

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  $19$
